name: h3
description: The 2026 DeMarini Zen Drop 10 USSSA Baseball Bat takes young athletes' performance to new heights with its innovative features. Designed for travel ball stars, this bat boasts a revamped Dark Matter Composite Barrel, offering an expansive sweet spot to enhance contact with every swing. Its balanced swing feel and two-piece composite construction allow for impressive swing speeds and consistent power, keeping the lineup energized. With the updated Direct Connection and Anomaly End Cap, players experience a forgiving feel and reduced swing weight, maximizing control and exit velocities. Certified with USSSA 1.15 BPF, the Zen Drop 10 is available in a striking green and black colorway, ready to make a bold impression on the field. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
